   implicit none

   integer :: n, num, ans, i, j, pos, pos2, insert_pos, val, key, M = 1000000007

   integer, allocatable :: keys(:), counts(:)

   integer :: size =0, max_size = 100000

   character(len=20) :: s

   integer :: len_s, result

   ! First part processing

   allocate(keys(max_size), counts(max_size))

   read(*,*) n

   do i=1, n

      read(*,*) num

      ! Find lower key

      integer :: low, high, mid

      low =1

      high = size

      pos =0

      do while (low <= high)

          mid = (low + high)/2
